tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Supplier_Information (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  contact_email VARCHAR(255),
  supplier_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Proposal_Analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  response_id INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  analysis_result TEXT,
  analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Proposal_Review (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    response_id UUID,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
    review_date DATE,
    approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Procurement_Statistics (
    stat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    response_id UUID,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    overall_rating INT,
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RFP_Responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rfp_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (rfp_id) REFERENCES RFPs(rfp_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Evaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    response_id INT,
    score INT,
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (response_id) REFERENCES RFP_Responses(response_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    average_score DECIMAL(5, 2),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (evaluation_id) REFERENCES Evaluation(evaluation_id)
);
